name: Plants Vs Zombies 2 First Person (EGYPT DEMO)
name_original: Plants Vs Zombies 2 First Person (EGYPT DEMO)
description:
Plants vs Zombies 2, but first person! See all of the new time periods, plants, and zombies in 3D!

This is only a DEMO. It features the opening part on the player's lawn and 2 Ancient Egypt levels.

(Shift+Escape to access the main menu in game)
